name: Alias Express
description:
As the vinyl record sets on ... you are opening your eyes on this train ride as detective with the case of  solving the murderer. You are tiered of talking so you dont talk, reading books is also not for you but you can still look at the enviroment for clues.

Controls:

  • WASD for walking
  • Mouse movement for looking around
  • Left mouse button for grabbing, opening, interacting with things
  • Right mouse button for dropping 
  • ESC main menu

You may tell me your conclusion on twitter : @who_kai . If you dont use windows feel free to contact me so I can ship it to your platform

Platime: ~5min

Linux Build comes probably thrusday, sunday
